title: Nonsense shows need for Trump
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

If the socialist Democrats really want a civil war by attacking honest gun owners and trying to impeach a president who hasn’t been tainted by globalist blackmailers, they are going to have to come up with a better excuse than a whistleblower’s lie. After ‘Russiagate,’ the extortionist Stormy Daniels and now the song of this supposed whistleblower, I’ve had enough. Trump 2020.

MICHAEL PACER

Paso Robles, Calif.

Sign up for Daily Opinion Newsletter
